articles.title: Pandemic Golden Globes ratings plunge 64% to 6.9M viewers - USA TODAY
articles.description: The pandemic-era Golden Globes sunk to 6.9 million viewers, down a whopping 64% from 2020.
articles.content: NEW YORK (AP) The pandemic-era Golden Globes sunk to 6.9 million viewers, down a whopping 64% from 2020 and only barely beating the year when a writer's strike forced NBC to show a news conference an… [+2349 chars]

articles.title: Bunny Wailer, reggae luminary and founder of The Wailers, has died at 73 - CBS News
articles.description: He formed The Wailers in 1963 with late superstars Bob Marley and Peter Tosh. He died Tuesday in his native Jamaica.
articles.content:

articles.title: 'Deepfake' Tom Cruise takes over TikTok with some 11 million views but raises alarms with experts - Daily Mail
articles.description: Videos showing who appears to be Tom Cruise on TikTok are actually deepfakes of the celebrity. Three videos have been posted, which have more than 11 million views together.
articles.content: Tom Cruise has gone viral on the popular video-sharing app TikTok, but the clips featuring the 'Mission Impossible' star are deepfakes that experts are calling the 'most alarmingly lifelike examples'… [+4505 chars]
